name: Hydro Cannon
effect: Inflicts Wounds. Recharge Move. -1 Accuracy. At the start of the recharge round, the User or an Ally gains a damage reduction equal to the Rank Bonus of the User (Applied after final damage calculations) for the entire duration of the round.
description: The Pokemon blasts the foe with a water surge that could bring down a house. The user needs to rest afterwards.
